name: Endless Dash Bouncer
description:
Slide to sides to move your ball between platforms, but watch out - it has a limited number of lives! You can bounce only 10 times, so make sure to collect more lives when you rush down!

Endless Dash Bouncer is simple, yet it requires good reflexes on your part. The longer your ball falls, the more speed it has and avoiding obstacles gets a whole lot more difficult! The road to the top of the high score is never easy and it's going to be a challenging race between your friends and you! How far will you get?
